Colon cleansing is commonly used in preparation for medical procedures such as colonoscopy. However, some alternative medicine practitioners offer colon cleansing for other purposes, such as detoxification. But colon cleansing ‚Äî also called colonic irrigation ‚Äî for this purpose is not important. review_title: I have been using the product "Health Plus, Super Colon Cleanse Night" for the last month
review_text: I have been using the product "Health Plus, Super Colon Cleanse Night" for the last month and I want to share my experience. These capsules are specially designed to clean the intestines while you sleep, which is very convenient because you don't need to change your daily schedule. The capsules contain a blend of natural ingredients, including herbs and fibers, that promote gentle and effective cleansing. After the first week of use, I noticed a significant improvement in the digestive system. In the morning, one feels lightness and lack of bloating, which makes the day more comfortable. Capsules do not cause severe spasms or discomfort, unlike some other cleaning products. Another advantage is that the product helps improve sleep. I noticed that falling asleep became easier, and the sleep itself became deeper and restorative. This, in my opinion, is due to the natural soothing ingredients included in the capsules. Regarding the ease of administration, the capsules are easy to swallow and do not have an unpleasant aftertaste. The instructions are clear and simple, which makes using the product even more convenient. Overall, I am very pleased with the results of using the Health Plus Super Colon Cleanse Night. It is an effective and gentle nighttime bowel cleanser that has improved my well-being and sleep quality. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a natural and convenient way to support gut health.

review_title: Health Plus, Super Colon Cleanse, Night Colon Cleanse, 90 Capsules
review_text: The action of the complex is based on two components: Psyllium Husk Powder and Senna Leaf Powder. Psyllium Husk can be helpful for bowel problems and to regulate and soften stools. He can cope with the opposite situation no less effectively. This is due to the fact that fiber has a beneficial effect on the functioning of the gallbladder, which in turn indirectly helps to improve the digestion of food. In addition, psyllium absorbs large amounts of water, it will absorb the excess it finds in the body, thereby improving the situation with diarrhea; lowering blood cholesterol levels. Psyllium can be helpful in lowering total cholesterol and lowering sugar levels. Psyllium can relieve bloating, flatulence, discomfort, pain in the abdomen. Senna is one of the most effective and safest treatments for constipation. The plant helps to normalize the intestines, helps to lose weight, cleanse the blood and intestines from harmful substances. Preparations based on cassia are used as a laxative and cleansing agent, the work of the digestive tract improves, secretion decreases, and peristalsis increases. Cassia has a mild choleretic effect, which has a beneficial effect on the process of digestion and absorption of food. Senna has a tonic and rejuvenating effect - rashes and signs of chronic fatigue disappear, the appearance of the skin improves; breaks down fat cells, accelerates the metabolic process; helps to improve the work of the heart muscle; has a mild diuretic, analgesic and anti-inflammatory effect. The plant does not provoke the appearance of spasms. The active ingredients of cassia are able to penetrate into the tissues of the joints, break down salt accumulations, strengthen the bone structure, purify the blood, and normalize the menstrual cycle.
